name: Meeple Maelstrom
description:
Meeple Maelstrom. 

You have broken out of your slumber and you seek revenge. Become the most powerful god in the land of the Meeples. Use your different powers to kill them and destroy their cities to gain more power and abilities to seek their demise. Be careful of the Meeples because they have the power to seal you back and beware of the Sealer's powerful attack.  Have fun in this short strategy game created by Dark Electron Games.  

Follow us in our social media @darkelectrongames on Instagram and TikTok 

GLHF
